name: guard-split
flavor_text: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
effect_text_extend: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pok√©mon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect_text_simple: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
